description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Flowers of Friendship: original and selected poems on the subject of Christian Friendship ... By J. F. Thorpe ... and another" Author: THORPE, John Frederic. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11601.f.19." Page: 17 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1857 Publisher: Judd & Glass Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003630718 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
